org.fluentjava.iterators
Class CountingIterator<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.fluentjava.iterators.AbstractExtendedIterator<T>
      org.fluentjava.iterators.ExtendedIteratorAdapter<T>
          org.fluentjava.iterators.CountingIterator<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<T>, java.util.Iterator<T>, ExtendedIterable<T>, ExtendedIterator<T>
public class CountingIterator<T>
extends ExtendedIteratorAdapter<T>

Extended Iterator Adapter that counts how many times next was invoked, mainly used to count the number of the iteration. The number of the iteration starts at 1, though it is 0 before any iteration.
